message.body: I miss you too!!! We have a myriad of things to catch up on. Seriously, we need a good talk!
I know! We should go out one day, just you and me. We need an us day, you know? But Sunday's good. Watching the flyers game.
That would be awesome! Let's do it! And I mean like next weekend or something :)
Yeah! Let's do it on like...Saturday or Sunday morning.
...assuming we were doing something on Friday. Unless that's the only day your able to go out.
How about Sunday? I'm not sure if we're going to go out on Friday but I have work Saturday :( I'm going to see how the weather is next weekend
That works. I figured you might have work Saturday. But Sunday works good!
